DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate Area Under Curve ( AUC ( 0 infinity ) ) anacetrapib subject impair renal function healthy match control subject .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Anacetrapib ( MK0859 ) Subjects With Impaired Renal Function ( MK-0859-038 )
DOC.criteria: Female subject reproductive potential test negative pregnancy agree use two acceptable method birth control throughout study Subject good health If Subject smoker , smoke limit 10 cigarette per day Subject history stroke , chronic seizure major neurological disorder Subject history cancer Subject unable refrain anticipates use prescription nonprescription medication study Subject consume excessive amount alcohol caffeine Subject major surgery , donate blood participate another investigational study within past 4 week Subject nursing mother Subject kidney remove functioning renal transplant
